璏字的基本解释

璏
zhì
w坕
玉制剑鼻。

璏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》于歲切，去祭，云。］
［《廣韻》直例切，去祭，澄。］
［《廣韻》王伐切，入月，云。］
剑鞘旁的玉制附件。古人佩剑，以带穿璏而系之腰间。

璏字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璏； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页741第23
【唐韻】【集韻】?直例切，音滯。【說文】劒鼻玉飾也。【前漢·王莽傳】碎玉劒璏。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?于歲切，音衞。義同。　又通作衞。【前漢·匈奴傳賜單于玉具劒註】標首鐔衞用玉。師古曰：劒口旁橫出曰鐔，鼻曰衞，與璏同。　又通作瑑。【前漢·王莽傳】美玉可滅瘢，欲獻其瑑。【註】瑑作璏。本音篆，雕刻也。古字通用。【正字通】按莽傳，進玉瑑于孔休。服虔曰：瑑，音衞。蘇林曰：劒鼻。皆未詳。璏，譌作瑑。師古曰：瑑字本作璏，从玉彘聲。後轉寫者譌，瑑自雕瑑字。師古說是。　又【集韻】王伐切，音越。義同。　【類篇】亦作㻰。

璏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璏字的起名意思

暂无。

Jue
Basic explanation of words
Jue
zhì
w
Jade sword nose.
Jue
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" cuts at every year, to sacrifice, cloud. ]
["Guangyun" cut straight, go to sacrifice, clear. ]
["Guangyun" Wang Faqie, into the moon, cloud. ]
The jade attachment next to the scabbard. The ancient saber was tied around the waist with a belt.
Jue
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璏; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 741 23
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Straight cut, sound lag. [Said the text] The nose is also decorated with jade. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Broken Jade 劒璏.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Yu Suiqie, sound guard. The same meaning.　You pass as a guard again. [Previous Han·Xiongnu's gift to Shan Yuyu Guzhe's Note] Mark the first Wei Wei with jade. Shigu said: The slogan says 镡, and the nose says Wei, which is the same as the 璏.　Through Zuoyu again. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Beautiful jade can destroy scars, and I want to offer it. [Note] Yuan Zuozhu. The original sound is also carved. Ancient characters are universal. 【Zhengzitong】According to Mang Chuan, enter Yuyuan in Kongxiu. Fu Qian said: Yu, Yinwei. Su Lin said: Biaobi. None are known. Zhuo, Jiaozhuo. Shi Gu said: The word "瑑" is originally made of 璏, and the sound is from Yu Yu. Later transcribed by Jia, Tao is from the carved word. Shi Gu said yes.　[Jiyun] Wang Faqie, Yinyue. The same meaning.　【Classes】also made 㻰.
Jue
